extDescription.message: Automatically suspend, park, hibernate inactive tabs and save up to 80% of memory, reduce load on your device, battery and heat.
extDescription.description: MAX 128: Automatically suspend, park, hibernate inactive tabs and save up to 80% of memory, reduce load on your device, battery and heat.

autoSuspendSliderValue.message: Will suspend tab after $1 of inactivity
autoSuspendSliderValue.description: Will suspend tab after $1 of inactivity

recycleAfterSliderValue.description: Ð¡an close tabs after $1 of tab inactivity

recycleKeepSliderValue.description: Will close tabs if there are more than $1 tabs

wizard_recycleAfterSliderValue.message: Can close tabs after $1 of tab inactivity
wizard_recycleAfterSliderValue.description: Slider label for auto-close tabs after inactivity

wizard_recycleKeepSliderValue.message: ...and only when window have more than $1 opened tabs
wizard_recycleKeepSliderValue.description: Slider label for minimum tabs threshold

pauseSuspender.message: Stop Tab Suspender for a while...
pauseSuspender.description: Stop Tab Suspender for a while...

resumeSuspender.message: Cancel timer and activate Tab Suspender.
resumeSuspender.description: Cancel timer and activate Tab Suspender.

addToWhitelist.message: Add to Whitelist to NOT suspend this site in future.
addToWhitelist.description: Add to Whitelist to NOT suspend this site in future.

suspendCurrentWindow.message: Immediately suspend all tabs at current window.
suspendCurrentWindow.description: Immediately suspend all tabs at current window.

suspendTabGroup.message: Immediately suspend all tabs in current tab group.
suspendTabGroup.description: Immediately suspend all tabs in current tab group.

suspendAll.message: Immediately suspend all tabs except current tab.
suspendAll.description: Immediately suspend all tabs except current tab.

unsuspendAllWindow.message: Immediately unsuspend all tabs at current window.
unsuspendAllWindow.description: Immediately unsuspend all tabs at current window.

unsuspendTabGroup.message: Immediately unsuspend all tabs in current tab group.
unsuspendTabGroup.description: Immediately unsuspend all tabs in current tab group.

ignoreCurrentTab.message: The marked tab will be ignored by Tab Suspender (Will be reset after browser restart, if you need permanent ignore please use Whitelist).
ignoreCurrentTab.description: The marked tab will be ignored by Tab Suspender (Will be reset after browser restart, if you need permanent ignore please use Whitelist).

changeHotkeys.message: Setup/Change hotkeys for fast access to Tab Suspender functions.
changeHotkeys.description: Setup/Change hotkeys for fast access to Tab Suspender functions.

popupCloseUnusedTabs.description: Label for close unused tabs feature

popupDontSuspendSite.description: Button to add site to whitelist

popupSiteInWhitelist.description: Message when site is already whitelisted

popupDontSuspendTab.message: Don't Suspend this Tab (Ignore while tab alive)

popupDonateTitle.message: If you like Tab Suspender, and would like to see it continue, new features and handling support requests...support project!

popupOpenSessionsNewWindow.message: Open Window Sessions in New window
popupOpenSessionsNewWindow.description: Title for open sessions in new window

popupShowByDefault.description: Show sessions by default checkbox label

popupSuspenderPausedFor.description: Label shown when suspender is paused

wizardIntro.message: - allows you to not worry about the huge number of opened tabs and their memory!

wizardClickNext.message: click NEXT to configure basic settings.

wizardOrSkip.message: or SKIP to use predefined configuration.

wizardStep2Question.message: After what idle amount of time you want to move each unused tab to sleep?

wizardStep3Question.message: Do you want to allow Tab Suspender to look for most rarely used or forgotten tabs and smoothly close them automatically?

wizardStep3HintPrefix.message: Helps you not to think about closing

wizardCompleteText.message: Tab Suspender, now, starts automatically suspend first unused tabs after $1 from this moment.

wizardVideoHint.message: If you want to suspend tabs earlier, you can suspend any tab by click button as shown on the video:

wizardErrorReports.message: Help Tab Suspender improve quality and send error reports
